1976), bụ onye South Africa na- eme ihe gbasara ọgwụ, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, onye bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ a họpụtara na Standard Chartered Bank, na-ahụ maka Africa, Middle East na Europe
Ọ ga-amalite ọrụ ya na Maachị 2022
Ọ ga-adabere na Dubai, na United Arab Emirates
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye so na kọmitii ndị ịsị nke Absa Bank Limited, na-ejikwa ọkwa osote onye isi oche maka ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa na azụmaahịa, yana onye isi ụlọ akụ mmekọrịta
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Absa afọ iri na anọ, dabere na Johannesburg, South Africa
A mụrụ ya na South Africa na njedebe 1970s
Bongiwe tolitere na Thembisa, mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Johannesburg
Mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị dị n'ógbè ahụ, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Witwatersrand, bụ ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Pharmacy
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta diploma diploma na Management na Wits Business School, ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa nke otu mahadum ahụ
Ugo mmụta ya nke Master of Business Administration bụ Gordon Institute of Business Science, ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa nke Mahadum Pretoria nyere ya
Bongiwe mechakwara mmemme nchịkwa dị elu na Harvard Business School
Mgbe akara mmụta mbụ ya gasịrị, Bongiwe rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere ọgwụ afọ ole na ole
Ọ mechara chọtar ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka njikwa na Accenture, na-arụ ọrụ ebe ahụ afọ abụọ
Ọ sonyeere Absa Bank Limited na 2007, na mgbe Barclays Africa Group bụ onye nwe oke
Mgbe otu afọ na Johannesburg gasịrị, a kpọgara ya na London, United Kingdom n'isi ụlọ ọrụ Barclays ka ọ nweta ọzụzụ nchịkwa ụlọ akụ
Bongiwe laghachiri na South Africa na 2009 wee were ọrụ na-abawanye nke nta nke nta
N'oge ọ hapụrụ Absa, ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Retail and Business Banking na Absa Bank Limited
